dict.string: Show the contextual menu on the finder selection

on alfred_script(q) -- Move finder on the forground tell application "Finder" to activate tell application "System Events" tell process "Finder" -- retrieve the selection of finder set theSelection to selection of application "Finder" -- if nothing is selected return a message for the notification if theSelection is equal to {} then return "select a file or folder" -- the name of the selected files set selectedFileName to {} -- set the names of the selection repeat with selectionItem in theSelection set selectedFileName to selectedFileName & name of (info for selectionItem as alias) end repeat ----------------------------- -- For the list view ----------------------------- try tell outline 1 of scroll area 2 of splitter group 1 of window 1 to perform action "AXShowMenu" return end try ----------------------------- -- For the icon view -- impossibility to do with multiple selection ----------------------------- try repeat with img in every image of UI element 1 of scroll area 2 of splitter group 1 of window 1 repeat with selectionNameItem in selectedFileName if (name of img as string) is equal to selectionNameItem as string then tell img to perform action "AXShowMenu" return end if end repeat end repeat end try ----------------------------- -- For the colums view ----------------------------- try repeat with scrollarea in every scroll area of scroll area 1 of browser 1 of splitter group 1 of window 1 repeat with textItem in every text field of list 1 of scrollarea repeat with selectionNameItem in selectedFileName if (value of textItem as string) is equal to selectionNameItem as string then tell textItem to perform action "AXShowMenu" return end if end repeat end repeat end repeat end try ----------------------------- -- For the cover flow view ----------------------------- try tell outline 1 of scroll area 2 of splitter group 1 of splitter group 1 of window 1 to perform action "AXShowMenu" return end try end tell end tell end alfred_script

# Version 1.0
## 1.0 > Showing the contextual menu works. > > Doesn't work for a multiple selection on the icon view.
## TO DO: > Make it work for the multiple selection on the icon view. > > Make it work on every application.
# DESCRIPTION
This workflow allows you to show the contextual menu on a selection in the finder.
# INSTALLATION
Nothing to do just use it :)
# USAGE OF THIS WORKFLOW
Select something in the finder and then hit the shortcut you have chosen.
# CREDITS / COPYRIGHT
If you have some suggestions or bug report email me @ alfredlotl (at) gmail (dot) com
